text: Spassky district is a district in Tatarstan. It is near the river Volga (Idel). Russian, Tatar, Chuvash and other people live here. There is a newspaper in Tatar and Russian languages in the district. A children's book author Abdulla Alish comes from this district. Category:Districts of Tatarstan
title: Spassky District, Republic of Tatarstan
